articles.title: Steven Spielberg Donates $25K to James Van Der Beek’s GoFundMe as It Hits $2M - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: 'Wicked: For Good' director Jon M. Chu also donated $10,000 to the 'Dawson's Creek' actor's family following his death.

articles.title: Stephen 'tWitch' Boss' widow Allison Holker announces engagement: 'Showed me how to love' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: 'So You Think You Can Dance' alum Allison Holker, who was previously married to the late Stephen 'tWitch' Boss, announced that she will be tying the knot with tech CEO Adam Edmunds after nearly two years of dating.

articles.title: Lego Star Wars ‘The Mandalorian and Grogu’ sets just launched, and we got a first look - CNN
articles.description: Today, Lego revealed five new Star Wars sets themed around the movie “The Mandalorian and Grogu.”

articles.title: The Winter’s Most Controversial Movie Has Revived a Decades-Old Debate. There’s Still No Clear Answer. - Slate
articles.description: A close reading of Emily Brontë’s Wuthering Heights and its many interpretations.

articles.title: ‘Love Story’ revisits JFK Jr. and Carolyn Bessette. It’s stirred some backlash - AP News
articles.description: FX and Hulu’s new series “Love Story: John F. Kennedy Jr. & Carolyn Bessette” retells the couple’s romance and death, and has sparked criticism from Kennedy's nephew, Jack Schlossberg. The show follows Kennedy and Bessette from an early meeting to the 1999 pl…

articles.title: 'RHONY' Reunion Show Not Replacing Jill Zarin After Firing - TMZ
articles.description: Jill Zarin is out at the 'RHONY' reunion show "The Golden Life," but producers aren't looking to fill her big shoes, at least as of now ... TMZ has learned.

articles.title: 20 Years After a ‘Friends’ Harassment Suit Was Dismissed, Baldoni-Lively Case Revisits Limits of Creative Freedom - Variety
articles.description: Justin Baldoni has invoked a case involving vulgar talk in the 'Friends' writers room to defend himself from Blake Lively's harassment suit.

articles.title: Republicans Have Moved Into a New, Even Dumber Phase of Bad Bunny Outrage - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Right-wing lawmakers have now called for multiple investigations into Bad Bunny's Super Bowl performance, calling the halftime show "pure smut."

articles.title: Whoopi Goldberg struggles to sit at The View table during painful discussion: 'I'm out' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Whoopi Goldberg struggled to sit at 'The View' table during an agonizing Hot Topics discussion about the Winter Olympics medalist who confessed to an affair during live TV interview.

articles.title: Tom Morello Mocks Video of Kid Rock Performing in Front of Sparse Audience for Turning Point USA - Billboard
articles.description: Tom Morello mocked Kid Rock's Turning Point USA halftime performance after a video of Rock singing to a sparse crowd began circulating online.

articles.title: ‘Spider-Noir’ Trailer: Nicolas Cage Is a Spider-Man Variant and Detective in Prime Video’s Black-and-White Series; May Release Date Set - Variety
articles.description: Watch the trailer for “Spider-Noir,” starring Nicolas Cage as the Spider-Man character.

articles.title: HGTV cancels 'Rehab Addict' after star Nicole Curtis uses a racial epithet during filming - NBC News
articles.description: HGTV canceled home renovation reality series "Rehab Addict" after host Nicole Curtis made an "offensive racial comment" during filming.

articles.title: Ashley Roberts makes major on-air blunder as she announces Dick Van Dyke's death - Yahoo
articles.description: Ashley Roberts was quickly corrected by her co-hosts after the error.

articles.title: Wim Wenders Says ‘We Have to Stay Out of Politics’ as Berlinale Jury Fields Questions About Israel and Palestine: Filmmakers ‘Have to Do the Work of People, Not the Work of Politicians’ - Variety
articles.description: The Berlin Film Festival got off to a political start on Thursday as the competition jury, led by Wim Wenders, fielded several questions about Gaza.

articles.title: Netflix’s new mystery series is the best TV show I’ve watched in 2026 so far — and it’s the perfect ‘Derry Girls’ follow-up - Tom's Guide
articles.description: ‘How to Get to Heaven from Belfast’ mixes memorable characters with an absorbing mystery

articles.title: Wasserman Exits Extend Beyond Music as Soccer Star Abby Wambach Departs: “Casey Should Resign” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "I know what I know, and I am following my gut and my values," Wambach said. "I will not participate in any business arrangement under his leadership."
